Question
========

Suppose the height of Dutch men has a normal distribution with a mean of 175 centimeters and a standard deviation of 7.5 centimeters. Then what is the percentage that is shorter than 162.5 centimeters?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,09%
* 4,78%
* 65%
* 70%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,09%: Incorrect
* 4,78%: Correct
* 65%: Incorrect
* 70%: Incorrect
